entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:13 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 01:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 01:17 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:17 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 01:17 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
